custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: PabloGFX
custom_nodes.title: Google Photos Loader - by PabloGFX
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that integrates Google Photos into your workflows. List albums, load images from specific albums, and search photos directly within ComfyUI. Features customizable image loading options, sorting, and efficient caching for seamless integration of your Google Photos library into AI image processing pipelines.

custom_nodes.author: Nojahhh
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI GLM-4 Wrapper
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI GLM-4 Wrapper. This powerful tool enhances your prompt engineering process by allowing users to easily construct detailed, high-quality prompts for image/video generation based on user image and/or user prompts.

custom_nodes.author: SeanScripts
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PixtralLlamaVision
custom_nodes.description: For loading and running Pixtral and Llama 3.2 Vision models

custom_nodes.author: DareFail
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Roboflow
custom_nodes.description:
This is a ComfyUI node that connects with [a/Roboflow workflows](https://roboflow.com/workflows/build).
Roboflow hosts hundreds of thousands of open source and custom object detection models.

custom_nodes.author: turkyden
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SmartCrop
custom_nodes.description: a ComfyUI Custom Node for [a/smartcrop.py](https://github.com/smartcrop/smartcrop.py)

custom_nodes.author: silveroxides
custom_nodes.title: Model and Checkpoint Loaders for NF4 and FP4
custom_nodes.description:
Nodes for loading both Checkpoints and UNET/Diffussion models quantized to bitsandbytes NF4 or FP4 format.
Still under development and some limitations such as using LoRA might apply still.

custom_nodes.author: logtd
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ViewCrafter
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes to use [a/ViewCrafter](https://github.com/Drexubery/ViewCrafter/tree/main) for novel view synthesis.

custom_nodes.author: dfghsdh
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_FluxPromptGen
custom_nodes.description:
Flux Prompt Generator is a custom node set for ComfyUI that enhances prompt generation and image captioning capabilities. It integrates advanced language models and image captioning techniques to provide versatile and powerful prompt manipulation tools for your AI image generation workflows.
NOTE:PORT OF [a/https://huggingface.co/Aitrepreneur/FLUX-Prompt-Generator](https://huggingface.co/Aitrepreneur/FLUX-Prompt-Generator) for COMFYUI

custom_nodes.author: liushuchun
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Lora_List_With_Url_Loader
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:ComfyUI_Lora_List_With_Url_Loader. Load  loras from  urls and auto fetch them on web if they are missing.

custom_nodes.author: leeguandong
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_CompareModelWeights
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes to use CompareModelWeights

custom_nodes.author: discus0434
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Flux Accelerator
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Flux Accelerator is a custom node for ComfyUI that accelerates Flux.1 image generation, just by using this node.

custom_nodes.author: edelvarden
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ImageMetadataExtension
custom_nodes.description: Custom node for ComfyUI. It adds additional metadata for saved images, ensuring compatibility with the Civitai website.

custom_nodes.author: yuvraj108c
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Facerestore TensorRT
custom_nodes.description:
This project provides an experimental Tensorrt implementation for ultra fast face restoration inside ComfyUI.
Note: This project doesn't do pre/post processing. It only works on cropped faces for now.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_pixtral_vision
custom_nodes.description: The ComfyUI_pixtral_vision is a powerful ComfyUI node designed to integrate seamlessly with the Mistral Pixtral API. It facilitates the analysis of images through deep learning models, interpreting and describing the visual content. Users can input an image directly and provide prompts for context, utilizing an API key for authentication.

custom_nodes.author: banqingyuan
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-text-replace
custom_nodes.description: NODES: OCR Location Node, Image Erase Node, Chat Overlay Node, Extract JSON Node.

custom_nodes.author: blob8
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_sloppy-comic
custom_nodes.description: Using IPAdapter for style consistency, the node accepts a story structured as text {prompt} text {prompt} etc. and generates a comic, saving it to /output. It also adds LLM API Request node, providing an openai compatible LLM API for generating the stories.

custom_nodes.author: mingsky
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MingNodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: ConvertGrayChannelNode, AdjustBrightnessContrastSaturationNode, BaiduTranslateNode.

custom_nodes.author: StartHua
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui_CXH_DeepLX
custom_nodes.description: NODES: CXH_DeepLX_Free, CXH_DeepLX_translate

custom_nodes.author: pedrogengo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LumaAI-API
custom_nodes.description: Luma Dream Machine API official ComfyUI custom node.

custom_nodes.author: cubiq
custom_nodes.title: Flux blocks patcher sampler
custom_nodes.description: This is an (very) advanced and (very) experimental custom node for the ComfyUI. It allows you to iteratively change the blocks weights of Flux models and check the difference each value makes.

custom_nodes.author: da2el-ai
custom_nodes.title: D2 XYPlot Utils
custom_nodes.description:
Custom node for using Prompt S/R in XY Plot
Also includes nodes for listing generic parameters like seed and cfg
Easy to manipulate as elements are separated by line breaks
Designed for use with the XY Plot custom node qq-nodes-comfyui, but may work with other custom nodes as well

custom_nodes.author: 311-code
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI MagicClip_Strength for SDXL
custom_nodes.description: This project allows you to adjust SDXL's two text encoder's strengths individually for clip_g (ViT-bigG) and clip_l (CLIP-ViT-L) within ComfyUI. (And other adjustments)

custom_nodes.author: godmt
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-List-Utils
custom_nodes.description: LIST and BATCH utilities which support: create, convert, get or slice items

custom_nodes.author: AIFSH
custom_nodes.title: ViewCrafter-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: a custom node for [a/ViewCrafter](https://github.com/Drexubery/ViewCrafter)

custom_nodes.author: Isi-dev
custom_nodes.title: Image to Painting and Inspyrenet Assistant Nodes
custom_nodes.description: These are ComfyUI nodes to assist in converting images to paintings and to assist the Inspyrenet Rembg node to totally remove, or replace with a color, the original background from images so that the background does not reappear in videos or in nodes that do not retain the alpha channel in rgba images.

custom_nodes.author: SoftMeng
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PIL
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: PIL Effects (Mexx), PIL TITLE (Mexx), PIL Merge Image (Mexx)

custom_nodes.author: Kinglord
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Slider_Sidebar
custom_nodes.description: A custom node that adds a UI element to the sidebar allowing easy access, navigation, and use of a massive collection (100+) of LECO (Slider) LoRAs. LECOs are an amazing tool to generate variance in your output with a minimal impact to consistency, i.e. deviating form your prompt. They can also allow you access to control parts of your image without taking up CLIP space, saving your token weights for more valuable keywords. If you haven't used them, there's never been a better time to try!

custom_nodes.author: amorano
custom_nodes.title: Cozy Link Toggle
custom_nodes.description: Toggle ComfyUI Graph Links On/Off from the Menu Bar. Provides an easy example on how to register and use the ComfyUI menubar extensions.

custom_nodes.author: revirevy
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui_saveimage_imgbb
custom_nodes.description: This custom node allow upscaling an image by a factor using a model.

custom_nodes.author: NyaamZ
custom_nodes.title: Efficiency Nodes ExtendeD
custom_nodes.description: Expansion of Efficiency Nodes for ComfyUI. Significant UX improvements.[w/NOTE: This node requires [a/Efficiency Nodes for ComfyUI Version 2.0+](https://github.com/jags111/efficiency-nodes-comfyui) and [a/ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts](https://github.com/pythongosssss/ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts). Also, this node makes changes to user.css.]

custom_nodes.author: NyaamZ
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI ImageGallery ExtendeD
custom_nodes.description: Custom javascript extensions for better UX for ComfyUI. Double click on image to open. It's convenient for checking images.

custom_nodes.author: chrissy0
custom_nodes.title: chris-comfyui-nodes
custom_nodes.description: This repository contains a custom node for ComfyUI that pads an image to be square, filling the new pixels black.

custom_nodes.author: folkghost
custom_nodes.title: CSV Search Node
custom_nodes.description: This repository contains a custom node for ComfyUI that allows searching for a keyword in the first column of a CSV file and returning a value from a specified column in that row. The node is designed to be modular and fit within the node-based workflow of ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: AIFSH
custom_nodes.title: SeedVC-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: a custom node for [a/seed-vc](https://github.com/Plachtaa/seed-vc)

custom_nodes.author: svdC1
custom_nodes.title: LoRa Dataset Tools
custom_nodes.description: NODES:Directory Loader, Filter Images Without Faces, Detect Faces and Draw Detection Box

custom_nodes.author: pydn
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI to Python Extension
custom_nodes.description: This custom node allows you to generate pure python code from your ComfyUI workflow with the click of a button. Great for rapid experimentation or production deployment.

custom_nodes.author: Dayuppy
custom_nodes.title: Discord Webhook
custom_nodes.description: A very simple Discord webhook integration node for ComfyUI that lets you post images and text.

custom_nodes.author: BetaDoggo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FastSDCPU
custom_nodes.description: A set of nodes for interfacing with the FastSDCPU webserver.

custom_nodes.author: ultimatech-cn
custom_nodes.title: FaceSimilarity
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for face comparison. This node utilizes Face++'s facial recognition and comparison algorithms by directly calling the Face++ API. Its usage in the workflow is as follows:

custom_nodes.author: AIFSH
custom_nodes.title: RealisDance-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: a custom node for [a/RealisDance](https://github.com/damo-cv/RealisDance)

custom_nodes.author: zhiselfly
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Alimama-ControlNet-compatible
custom_nodes.description: Compatible with alimama's SD3-ControlNet Demo on ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: MetaGLM
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI ZhipuAI Platform
custom_nodes.description: This platform extension provides ZhipuAI nodes, enabling you to configure a workflow for online video generation.

custom_nodes.author: nchenevey1
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-gimp-nodes
custom_nodes.description: Provides nodes geared towards using GIMP as a frontend for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: aimerib
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-HigherBitDepthSaveImage
custom_nodes.description: A comfyui node that provides save image with higher bit depth.

custom_nodes.author: cr7Por
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_DepthFlow
custom_nodes.description:
comfyui custom node for depthflow
original depthflow website: [a/https://github.com/BrokenSource/DepthFlow](https://github.com/BrokenSource/DepthFlow)
check this for installation: [a/https://brokensrc.dev/get/](https://brokensrc.dev/get/)

custom_nodes.author: daxcay
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TG
custom_nodes.description: Node to enable Telegram in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: LyazS
custom_nodes.title: net tool node for comfyui
custom_nodes.description: A net tool node for comfyui, rewrite from [comfyui-tooling-nodes](https://github.com/Acly/comfyui-tooling-nodes) but support more big data sending.

custom_nodes.author: Metal3d
custom_nodes.title: Human Parts Detector
custom_nodes.description: Detect human parts using the DeepLabV3+ ResNet50 model from Keras-io. You can extract hair, arms, legs, and other parts with ease and with small memory usage.

custom_nodes.author: openart
custom_nodes.title: openart-comfyui-deploy
custom_nodes.description: NODES: External Boolean (ComfyUI Deploy), External Checkpoint (ComfyUI Deploy), External Image (ComfyUI Deploy), External Video (ComfyUI Deploy x VHS), OpenArt Text, Image Websocket Output (ComfyDeploy), ...

custom_nodes.author: Fuwuffy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Visual Area Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This is a collection of nodes created to aid when managing area conditionings.

custom_nodes.author: Cyber-BCat
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Auto_Caption
custom_nodes.description: This report contains a 'load many images' node which is going to load the image set by the number of file names from smallest to largest, and the images will no longer be loaded in the wrong order! Setting index=0 makes it load from the first small value (image flie name) image, and index=2 will load them from the second image. Another node 'load images & resize' can resize the image by the first loaded image.

custom_nodes.author: HentaiGirlfriendDotCom
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-highlight-connections
custom_nodes.description: A node that can be dropped into a group. When a node is then clicked within that group, all nodes and connections in that group get greyed out and the connections from the clicked node go bright red.

custom_nodes.author: logtd
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DiLightNet
custom_nodes.description:
ComfyUI nodes to use [a/DiLightNet](https://github.com/iamNCJ/DiLightNet).
These nodes can run DiLightNet, but the Dust3r or BlenderPy implementations to create lighting are not included. Expect those to be added to seperate repos when time allows.

custom_nodes.author: Bin-sam
custom_nodes.title: DynamicPose-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: NODES:pose_extraction, Load_reference_unet, Load_denoising_unet, Load_Pose_Guider, Pose_Guider_Encode, DynamicPose_Sampler, load_pose_model, align

custom_nodes.author: kinglord
custom_nodes.title: Prompt Gallery
custom_nodes.description: New UI on the sidebar that allows for quick and easy navigation of images to help build styles, characters, backgrounds, etc. or even entire random prompts.

custom_nodes.author: daxcay
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WA
custom_nodes.description: Node to enable WhatsApp in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: alexcong
custom_nodes.title: Qwen2-VL wrapper for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Qwen2-VL wrapper that supports text-based and single-image queries.

custom_nodes.author: LatentRat
custom_nodes.title: comfy_remote_run
custom_nodes.description: Nodes to run nodes on remote ComfyUI instances.

custom_nodes.author: alexisrolland
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Phi
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes to run microsoft/Phi models.

custom_nodes.author: Extraltodeus
custom_nodes.title: CLIP-Token-Injection
custom_nodes.description: These nodes are to edit the text vectors of CLIP models, so to customize how the prompts will be interpreted. You could see it as either customisation, 'one token prompt' up to some limitation and a way to mess with how the text will be interpreted. The edited CLIP can then be saved, or as well the edited tokens themselves. The shared example weights does not contain any image-knowledge but the text vector of the words affected.

custom_nodes.author: RhizoNymph
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-CLIPSlider
custom_nodes.description: A node to replicate [a/https://huggingface.co/spaces/latentexplorers/latentnavigation-flux](A node to replicate https://huggingface.co/spaces/latentexplorers/latentnavigation-flux)

custom_nodes.author: AIFSH
custom_nodes.title: DiffSynth-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: a custom node for [a/DiffSynth-Studio](https://github.com/modelscope/DiffSynth-Studio)

custom_nodes.author: tachyon-beep
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Simple Feed
custom_nodes.description: A lightweight image tray forked from Comfy-UI-CustomScripts with simple sorting, positioning and filtering options.

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_DeepFakeDefenders
custom_nodes.description: ou can using DeepFakeDefenders in comfyUI to Prediction image is a DeepFake img or not.

custom_nodes.author: VykosX
custom_nodes.title: ControlFlowUtils
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes to improve flow control and logic + several utilities to enhance capabilities

custom_nodes.author: Tenney95
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-NodeAligner
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-NodeAligner is a lightweight ComfyUI layout plugin that includes features such as node alignment, distribution, and resizing. This plugin is designed to simplify layout adjustments in visual node editors or custom UI components, making node arrangement more convenient and efficient.
